name: Humanitarian Helicopter
description: Two pilots, James and Ben, are on a quest to help survivors of earthquakes in California. Each of them learns to help instead of harm survivors. Having a helicopter, the player rescues people by transporting them to surviving houses, supplying additional food for them. They overcome difficulties such as strong wind, wild animals willing to takeover discharged food, and closed gates to settlements. The aim of the game is to form only positive character traits. There are 50 levels, 3 modes of difficulties and 8 skills that can be employed to improve performance in the game. Game offers an option of off-TV play as well.
